column4: im trying to recored something in skype with the sound test but it seems nothing is heard - maybe the microphone is in a very low volume which i cant correct from alsa - what should i do?
Have you checked the audio settings to see if you have the correct device?
yes but what should i do there?
Keep trying different ones until one, hopefully, works.
But I found I have always had to go throught the list to find one that would work for me.
what field is for the microphone?
should i reset something or go to skype right after?
I don't have it on this machine so I can't check it out.
I think it remembers the last setting.
Use the test call. You should be able to hear yourself and the response.
Wait a week and upgrade and try again...
in windows i had a similar problem - latley someone told me that the microphne works very low but i dont know how to change it
